Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog

Interface NodeDialog

All Superinterfaces:
UIExtension
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultNodeDialog
public interface NodeDialog extends UIExtension
Represents a dialog of a node.
Since:
4.5
Author:
Martin Horn, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany

    • canBeEnlarged

      default boolean canBeEnlarged()
      Indicates whether the dialog (optionally) wants/needs to be displayed in an enlarged display area.
      Returns:
      if true if it can be enlarged, otherwise false
